comments_since_last_sample.body: Hi Christina, your Christmas flips were awesome, I love them all, you have such a creative talent.  Those knitted stars would make a lovely bunting as well.  Thanks for sharing.

I loved all of these! The paper wreath in a slightly larger scale would also make a great advent calendar. Just punch a hole in the top of the round part and the flappy top part of each cone, feed some thread through the holes, fill the cone with a piece of candy and tie the thread. Then write the numbers on the closed "lids" with a marker.
Absolutely brilliant thrift flips. I loved them all 😍. Thank you 😊
I’ve ever noticed that you use that little tiny glue gun before. I rarely use one, but have one of those rechargeable battery glue guns. Sounds like a Christmas request?
